name: Low Delta
role_in_state: tidal foodbelt, reagent landing & repair hub
economy_niches: shipbreaking and hull repairs on sheltered flats
culture_adjustments: stronger tide-calendar rituals tied to planting/catching cycles
guild courts dominate local dispute resolution over distant magistrates
practical syncretism: ancestor rites incorporate tide-omens
oral Coastal Tongues variants with many marine metaphors
constraints: limited heavy industry due to marshy ground
ritual magic consumes imported reagents (logistics constrained)
notes: navigation relies on local auguries plus tide-charts
guilds control reagent quotas and pier access
